title: [SOLVED]820-3437 after repair show 100% battery only when charging
message: the 1.85V buffering cap was shorted C7375, replaced, F7140 went out too, replaced, now macbook is working fine, charging, works on battery, but when i connect the charger right away shows 100% charge, and when disconnected shows the actual charge, like 84%, SMC PRAM reset, same thing, actually it is wokrking fine but that is weird, tried 2 new batteries, same

title: [SOLVED]820-3437 after repair show 100% battery only when charging
message:
I'm speculating here.. until a pro turns up.

Is Q7155 damaged? Check to see if it's blocking properly between Drain & source, or if there's any conduction between gate and D/S

( Likewise check R7150 - 51 - 52,  maybe U7100 was damaged, though I'm not familiar enough with how macOS derives its battery charge status % )

title: [SOLVED]820-3437 after repair show 100% battery only when charging
message: The usual checks done around the ISL6259? Resistance between 17/18 27/28? PPBUS voltage without battery? Q7155 shorted or fried?

title: [SOLVED]820-3437 after repair show 100% battery only when charging
[SOLVED]820-3437 after repair show 100% battery only when charging
message:
no water damage, q7155 is fine

replaced u7100, same
i will leave it like that
